item.title: Greetings!

item.dc:creator: Anita Sz√°m
item.content:encoded:
My first blog post

Hello there visitor! This is a blog I'm writing about my journey as a female web developer.
There are tons of tech blogs, tons of lifestyle blogs, but as of today, I haven't come across a blog about tech as a lifestyle.
I plan to write about my experiences in front-end development and things I've learned, the newest technologies and gadgets, but also stuff that related to being a woman, more than being a person in IT.
I hope you're going to enjoy my posts, and please come again!

xoxo

Anita
